page.title: 17Cable T.V. in Westhill
page.content: {Cable T.V.}came to Westhill on 4.5.1985. It is transmitted from London but there is a local office in Aberdeen. So far there are 11 cable channels available plus BBC and ITV. Cable T.V. is a type of Media and it is a popular form of entertainment around Europe. Many people are receiving it in Westhill and most say it is educational and entertaining because there is a wide variety of good programmes. When we interviewed the public,women liked the{Premiere } channel and men liked the{Sports } channel. The public are annoyed at roads and gardens being dug up, but at Â£16.95 a month it is reasonably priced.A gardener tidies the gardens and council workers fill in the roads. The main company involved is British Telecom,but another company,Kevin Oliphant, supplies the equipment.
